storyInfo:
Blaze dispatches of the enemy and groups up with Amiya. With her is GreyThroat, an operator who Blaze seems to have some bad blood with.
Elsewhere, Ch'en and Swire fight side-by-side again.

attributes.content: Hah...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Luckily I did some warm up back in Chernobog. But really, I didn't even break a sweat handling you guys.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You! You Rhodes Islander, you're a disgrace to all Infected. How could you turn on your own like this just to help Lungmen?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: So you'll hand us over to them, as if that keeps your hands clean? Bullshit! How do you live with yourself?!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Huh?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: You ate two punches, cracked your skull on the pavement and you've still got the energy to talk trash? Not bad.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But you've got it all wrong.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Mmf!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Having trouble breathing? Feel like your lungs are on fire?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Ack... Guh...
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: It starts in your sinuses, then crawls down your windpipe, until it finally finds a home there in your diaphragm. All I have to do is wiggle my little finger and...
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: A stream of superheated air will shoot into your body, expand, ignite your organs, and erupt out of your pores.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: The funny thing is, Lungmen might let you live. But me and my little finger...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Aah! Gaaah...!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Won't leave any of you breathing.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Nooooo! L-let me go! Please!!!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Fine. I'll be merciful.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Officer! Over here. You take care of them.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: And one more thing, my new Ursus buddy. You think next time you could actually make me break a sweat?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, they made it.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Dr. {@nickname}, over here!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hah. That was nothing.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: How about next time I show you how to snap an arm 90 degrees without breaking the bone?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hey, what's with that face...?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: How long have you been at Rhodes Island? You're acting like you've never seen a fight before.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Compared to them, I'm a regular softie.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But of course. You think I'm the type to play it low-key?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: If I can put the fear of Blaze into them, who knows how many others might just give up.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I have to play it up to make all my hard work worth something.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Let's not steer the Doctor astray...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Bunny!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Don't just scoop me up like a toy!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But you're just so soft...! Hey! Stop struggling! Just let it happen. I promise I won't bite!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze... Stop... Can't... Breathe!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Phew.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: We've only been apart for an hour! What's with you! Get serious!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I take it back. You're not cute.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: That's enough...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Woah, hey, I was just playing! Get out of my head! I can't take you screwing around with my emotions again!
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Wait.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: She's here with you?
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Hello, I'm...
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I know who you are.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Talk to my fellow Infected like that again and I'll tear out your throat myself.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: Blaze!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Sorry, Amiya.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: But that's the way it is. And she deserves a warning.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: I'm out. Rendezvous at the next waypoint.
attributes.name: Blaze

attributes.content: GreyThroat, Blaze may have misunderstood you.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It's fine. I really did say those things.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: She shouldn't be dredging up your past to attack the person you are today.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Who knows? Have I really changed? Even I don't know.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: I'm here because I wanted to do something. No matter what that Blaze says.
attributes.name: GreyThroat

attributes.content: Sigh...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Right... She's not Infected, so GreyThroat might not grasp the reality of Rhodes Island's current situation.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (This operation could force her to decide once and for all... if she's going to stay or leave.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (But she's gotten used to taking orders, and doesn't speak up much. Sometimes she does surprise, though...)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (There's no malice in her heart. She just needs a chance to find herself.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: (Still, she's strong and reliable. You can trust her, Doctor. And even if we can't help her, I know she can help you.)
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Oh... where did Gavial go?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Got too excited and went to crack some skulls?;......;Probably went to do frivolous collateral damage.

attributes.content: She can't do that!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Wait a minute, who taught you to think of her like that, Doctor? I mean, it's kind of true, but still...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We can't afford to make mistakes here. Hurry to the next waypoint and try to signal her.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Even if she's operating according to plan, there'll be trouble if no one's watching her...
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We've got elite operators acting as squad leaders. They'll report in. Don't worry.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: We stand at a crucial point in this joint operation. This is the decisive battle for Lungmen.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: She has her own mission to command.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Superintendent Ch'en, as Chief of the Special Inspection Unit, will be deploying the best the L. G. D. has to offer against Reunion in service of our joint plan.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: At the same time, she has to herd Reunion's main force to the target location, all while keeping any of their smaller teams from slipping into the slums.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: And we, Rhodes Island, will keep moving through the waypoints on our patrol route, mopping up Reunion's squads along the way, pushing them to give up the fight.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Finally, we'll reach the target location at the slums and, together with the L. G. D., we'll deliver the decisive blow to Reunion's main force.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Considering the scale, there's relatively little Rhodes Island can do. But we'll execute the plan to the best of our abilities.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: As for the issues that have come up in the course of our cooperation with the L. G. D.... Dr. {@nickname}, I promise to answer all our people.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But, Doctor, there is something only you can do.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Leave it to me!;......;Should I be taking this more seriously?

attributes.content: Heh, good.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: But it's not the kind of thing you'll have to put so much effort into.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Now's not the time to clam up!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Are you waiting for me to say more?
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You could at least tell me what you're thinking, Doctor...!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: No, that's okay!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: This isn't the kind of thing you need to be so solemn about.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I'm going to call up Blaze and have her look after you. And for the little while until we meet up again, I need you to look after her too.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.options: Me look after her? Have you seen me?;......;I can protect an elite operator? News to me.

attributes.content: Ugh... I'm not talking about like in battle! I mean look after her psychology.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: You know Rhodes Island has to fight the Infected sometimes.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Especially right now. Our cooperation with Lungmen has led to some friction.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Blaze is one of the elite operators we rely on for survival, yes, but her psychological state has an impact on her performance.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: It is because she is so resolutely committed to our mission that her encounters with the Infected have the potential to influence her emotions.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Go on, Doctor. Treat it as an opportunity to learn what makes her tick.
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Show your appreciation for her. Thank her for saving you back there. She'll eat it up!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: I believe in you, Doctor! Go get 'em!
attributes.name: Amiya

attributes.content: Their main force is engaging our other teams!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: We will reach the target location ahead of Reunion and join the formation!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Tell them we need to eliminate all Reunion elements that have not joined up with their main force first.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Right. Got it!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Do what Superintendent Ch'en just said! Over and out!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: How long has it been since we fought together like this?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: I wouldn't say we're 'fighting together' now. It's more like we're 'co-belligerents.' How did you get back here anyway?
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: I've got my own motor pool, of course. How else do you think I saved Rhodes Island? Now what's got your panties in a twist? I can tell you're upset.
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hm. Let me think.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: You need to think about it! Look at you looking for reasons to be mad...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Oh, right. You went behind my back to save Rhodes Island. You could have told me in private.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Was that embarrassing for you? Or you just don't like being kept in the dark?
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Both.
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Wowee... since when are you so direct? My old Officer Ch'en would talk herself in circles for hours...
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Eyes forward!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: L. G. D. defender squad, shields up! Play it just like we have a million times before. And never forget, your brothers and sisters are right behind you! Stand firm!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Hold!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Crossbows, nock!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: They blocked this road too? Uh oh... there's nowhere to go! We're trapped!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Relax, we can break them! With me!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: Hold!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Guards, ready!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Overrun them!
attributes.name: Reunion Member

attributes.content: ——Now!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Crossbows, first volley, fire!
attributes.name: Swire

attributes.content: Pikes up!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Don't let a single one of them out of our city!
attributes.name: Ch

attributes.content: Are you on site?
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Yes, that's right.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I know. But the L. G. D. has their job to do and you have yours. Don't forget your role in all this.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Indeed. Lin Kojui is quite opposed.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: But this matter is beyond him!
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I've heard all the opinions from all the stakeholders. But there is no wiggle room here. I do what must be done.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Kojui's daughter will reach out to you. In the next three weeks, you are not to contact me. Everything goes to her.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: I leave it to you. Don't worry. I am watching you.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: ...There's no need for that. The past is the past. And it stays in the past.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Right. To the peaceful and stable future of Lungmen.
attributes.name: Wei Yenwu

attributes.content: Wei, old boy, we're brothers, of a sort, aren't we...?
So I'm asking you, for the sake of my daughter and her mother...
Honestly, should I even have to ask? Would you really refuse to help your own sister?
I've already decided on a name for my daughter. We'll call her...
...Talulah.
Don't take it to heart. I understand.
It's all very clear to me.
